mapper.select: select *, 0 as 'type' from athlete where id = (select athlete_id from athlete_event where event_id = #{eventId})
mapper.insert: insert into group_athlete (`order`, group_id, athlete_id) values (#{order}, #{groupId}, #{athleteId})
insert into group_referee (chief_referee, referee_id, group_id) values (#{chiefReferee}, #{refereeId}, #{groupId})
